resources.string: ONLINE mode

This mode will required internet connection. You will be able to access full features of this application. Internet and battery usage is already optimized for good user experience. Don\'t worry, you can switch anytime from settings.
OFFLINE mode
This is lightweight mode and do not require internet connection. Only basic features will be available. Don\'t worry, you can switch anytime from settings.
Change mode
Are you sure you want to change online mode ? You can switch back again anytime :)
Are you sure you want to change offline mode ? You can switch back again anytime :)
Are you sure you want to change CAMP16 mode ? You can switch back again anytime :)

This map presents approximate information about locations. Real route/location might vary depending on traffic, laws and new rules. Please do not rely entirely on the provided information. Developers are not responsible for any mistake/delay/mishap due to information presented here.
